code: import apiClient from'./client';class UserService{async getUsers(){const response=await apiClient.get('/v1/users');return response.data;}async getUsersByCompany(companyId){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/users/company/".concat(companyId));return response.data;}async getUsersByDepartment(departmentId){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/users/department/".concat(departmentId));return response.data;}async getUserById(id){const response=await apiClient.get("/v1/users/".concat(id));return response.data;}async getUserProfile(){const response=await apiClient.get('/v1/users/profile');return response.data;}async createUser(userData){const response=await apiClient.post('/v1/users',userData);return response.data;}async updateUser(id,userData){const response=await apiClient.put("/v1/users/".concat(id),userData);return response.data;}async updateUserProfile(userData){const response=await apiClient.put('/v1/users/profile',userData);return response.data;}async activateUser(id){const response=await apiClient.patch("/v1/users/".concat(id,"/activate"));return response.data;}async deactivateUser(id){const response=await apiClient.patch("/v1/users/".concat(id,"/deactivate"));return response.data;}async deleteUser(id){await apiClient.delete("/v1/users/".concat(id));}}const userService=new UserService();export default userService;
